cast.overview: A television reporter and cameraman follow emergency workers into a dark apartment building and are quickly locked inside with something terrifying.
cast.title: [REC]

details.biography: Manuela Velasco is a Spanish actress and host born in Madrid. She made her debut on a movie at only 8 years of age. She is best known for her outstanding and popular work in REC saga directed by Jaume Balagueró. She has participated in an important range of tv shows with small roles like 'Cuéntame como pasó' or 'Ángel o demonio'. Currently she is member of the cast of 'Velvet', one of the most popular tv shows in Spain.
details.name: Manuela Velasco
